author: jenniferrlewis614
title: ADA Token to Combat Homelessness
description: Americans should have rental assistance. However, with only 11% of government funds distributed, 750,000 families now face eviction.
solution: Create a native ADA token that is specifically used for providing rental assistance grants to those in need.
experience: Jennifer R. Lewis spent five years serving as a homeless shelter counselor and is now pursuing a Master's in Psychology.
